Desc.entry: A registered charity which manages funds on behalf of corporate organisations, local and central government and charitable trusts. Distributes funds to local community and voluntary groups and individuals (funding for individuals is very limited) throughout South Yorkshire. Provides funds and grants for small to medium groups, especially where they have had difficulty getting funding from other sources. Applications forms can be found on the website. Activities that promote religious or political views are ineligible for a grant but funding may be available for faith groups involved in general activities. Priority is given to groups in disadvantaged areas. Further information available on the website.
